meanings.definition: The end or conclusion of something.
meanings.sent1: The movie had a happy finis with the main characters getting married.
meanings.sent2: The finis of the book left readers wanting more.
meanings.sent3: At the finis of the race, the tortoise surprised everyone by winning.
meanings.sent4: As the sun set, it marked the finis of another beautiful day.
meanings.sent5: The finis of the concert was marked by a spectacular fireworks display.

meanings.sent1: The fence acted as the finis of the property.
meanings.sent2: The river served as the natural finis between the two kingdoms.
meanings.sent3: The finis of the game was the white line on the field.
meanings.sent4: The mountain range formed a majestic finis to the horizon.
meanings.sent5: The finis of the forest was where the trees thinned out.

meanings.sent1: The artist added a golden finis to the painting.
meanings.sent2: The chef's special sauce was the perfect finis to the dish.
meanings.sent3: The finis of the outfit was a sparkling brooch.
meanings.sent4: The final flourish was the ideal finis to the performance.
meanings.sent5: The decorative border was the exquisite finis to the room.
